Nota isso substituirá *TODAS* as chamadas da servidora! Avalie o app na loja! Influence trip results by setting what\'s most important to you Minimum transfer time in minutes Cycling speed Show school buses in result list Show shuttle buses in result list Distance units to use in trip results Automatically calculate trips to your favorite locations Show an alert to leave at the start of a trip Show an alert before any public transport on your trip Show an alert towards the end of any public transport on your trip Show service alerts which affect your upcoming trips Allow TripGo to anonymously track your app usage Allow TripGo to anonymously track your location when you use it (NOT in the background) Use your contact addresses as location suggestions. This information is not stored on any server Use your upcoming calendar events as location suggestions. This information is not stored on any server

This app requires Google Play Services to be installed.\n\nPlease download it to continue using the app Get Google Play Services
Try our other app TripGo is not working in your area yet. However, we have another app using crowdsourced data that works everywhere. How about you giving it a go? Thanks!

Edit event Show agenda list Show agenda map View your daily agenda and favourites in the tabs below Zoom into the map to view public transport stops To add a new favourite, click the plus button You haven\'t selected a location Use TripGo agenda No calendars enabled in TripGo settings Don\'t repeat Go to Now Timetable " at " Service " every %1$s %2$s" Save to calendar Address not found View Times Empty event is not saved From %1$s To %1$s Time to leave for Leave now to make it on time It looks like you have a trip to make Delete Delete this event Only this event This and future events All events Choose recurrence end date Add Location Network error, please check your Internet connection and try again There was an error and it was reported to us. Please try again You must select at least one type of transport Location selected Starts Ends Routines are post of your daily movement, but they aren\'t events that you want in your calendar (e.g. work). They are important for the Agenda to get you to the right location at the right time All your calendars are disabled in TripGo, please enable them in Settings section Event does not fit Event excluded Event updated, it may take a while to see the change Set start time Set end time Tap to set a location Title
